page.title: 05THE GALA DAY
page.content: THERE ARE EVENTS FOR BOTH CHILDREN AND ADULTS.ONE OF THE MOST IMPORTANT EVENTS TAKES PLACE ON THE THIRD SATURDAY OF JUNE.A FEW WEEKS BEFORE PROGRAMMES ARE SOLD. EVERY YEAR THE{GALA DAY}TAKES PLACE STARTING WITH A PARADE IN WHICH DECORATED LORRIES CALLED FLOATS DRIVE UP MOST STREETS WITH A{PROCESSION}OF BROWNIES ,GUIDES ,SCOUTS AND OTHER CLUBS MARCHING BEHIND. THEN COMES THE{PAGEANT}WHERE THE QUEEN OF HEARTS IS CROWNED.THE CHARACTERS ARE SELECTED FROM THE 3 PRIMARY SCHOOLS. PICNIC BAGS ARE DISTRIBUTED IN THE PARK. AFTER THIS COME THE{SPORTS COMPETITIONS FOR CHILDREN AND SOME ADULTS.IN THE AFTERNOON AND NIGHT THE {FUNFAIR}OPENS AT WHICH THERE ARE THE BIG WHEEL ,UMBRELLAS ,DIVEBOMBERS AND THE SPACE INVADERS.
